post.desc:
In case you're wondering ‚Äì yes, [**ramen with fried rice on the side**](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Nidaime_shoyu_ramen_Tsukasa_and_mix_set_(half_fried_rice_and_gyoza)_at_Korakuen,_Jindaiji_(34045228362).jpg) is a thing.

And order the special in the back at your own risk üóø That's basically an "Every Broth" ramen.
